Hello Matteo,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

Hello CISALPINA,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

Hello Jelena,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

guest: Dear Riccardo,
My name is Diana and my family and I will travel to Triest  on 4 July. We are four - 2 adults and 2 children ( 10 and 13 years old respectively).
We are interested in your apartment and therefore we would like to ask you for some additional information:

È soltanto una proposta, perché utilizziamo ogni mattina il toaster per il pane e quindi ne approfitteremmo.  :-)

guest: Ah, ok. Dann ist es klar.

host: Thank you 😊 the building is very old and sometimes some reflux happens from the wc. Sorry about that ☺️ enjoy your stay!

guest: Hallo Riccardo, vielen Dank für Deine Mail. Wir sind gestern ziemlich spät angekommen. Haben aber alles leicht gefunden. (Schlüssel, etc.) Sogar einen Parkplatz. ;-)
 In der Wohnung passt alles. Eine kleine Sache möchte ich erwähnen: Die Toilette wurde offenbar für ein großes Geschäft genutzt, unten steckten noch die Reste . Erst durch Spülen und Bürsten habe ich die Toilette wieder sauber bekommen.
Ansonsten ist hier alles sehr sauber.
Ich werde Dir bald die Kopien unserer Personalausweise schicken.
Vielen Dank nochmal für Deine Verfügbarkeit.

Ciao Zoe,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al piano ammezzato, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio. Ti ho fatto un video così non puoi sbagliare https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4q0y9WM4uk

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Rittmeyer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello Zoe,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello Paolo,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 8B. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 8, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 8B. Enter the code 2550 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

Ciao Eric,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al piano ammezzato, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio. Ti ho fatto un video così non puoi sbagliare https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4q0y9WM4uk

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Rittmeyer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

Hello Eric,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio. Ti ho fatto un video così non puoi sbagliare https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4q0y9WM4uk

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Rittmeyer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

Hello Rosario,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Hello Camilla,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

host: °°°ENGLISH BELOW°°°

Ciao Sona,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al piano ammezzato, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio.

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Rittmeyer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello Sona,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

host: °°°ENGLISH BELOW°°°

Ciao Mauro,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al piano ammezzato, porta 5A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 5 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 5A. Inserite il codice 2503 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio. Ti ho fatto un video così non puoi sbagliare https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4q0y9WM4uk

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 12€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Rittmeyer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello Mauro,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 5A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 5, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 5A. Enter the code 2503 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 12€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al piano ammezzato, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Vi invieremo qui, 5 giorni prima del vostro arrivo, i codici di accesso per entrare nell'appartamento.

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 12€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste che si trova a pochi metri di distanza.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Rittmeyer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Hello Mauro,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 12€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello craig,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

Hello Angela,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello Barbara,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find the door number 6, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello Herr,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Rittmeyer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

Ciao Andre,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al piano ammezzato, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio.

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Ritmayer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello Andre,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, mezzanine floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello Lucrezia,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al primo piano. L'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio.

Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

host: °°°ENGLISH BELOW°°°

Ciao Caterina,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al primo piano, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Vi invieremo qui, 5 giorni prima del vostro arrivo, i codici di accesso per entrare nell'appartamento.

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste che si trova a pochi metri di distanza.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Ritmayer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello Caterina,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

We will send you here, 5 days before your arrival, the access code to enter the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello Saverio,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

Avremmo necessità di effettuare il check out almeno alle ore 13:00 del giorno successivo in quanto la mattina lavoreremo in telelavoro.

Le chiedo pertanto se è nelle sue capacità poterci permettere di restare fino a tale ora.

Grazie mille,
Damiano

host: °°°ENGLISH BELOW°°°

Ciao Steven,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al primo piano, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio.

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Ritmayer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello Steven,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Hello Elisa,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Hello Martina,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

host: °°°ENGLISH BELOW°°°

Ciao laura,
ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo.

L’appartamento si trova in via Ghiberti 6, al primo piano, porta 6A. Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00.

Accesso al palazzo: suonate il campanello "Ghiberti 6", il primo in basso a desta della pulsantiera di destra. La porta si aprirà in automatico. Utilizzerete questo metodo per tutti i vostri accessi.
Accesso all'appartamento: salite le scale e troverete di fronte a voi, una porta con il numero 6 e, a lato, delle cassette a combinazione. La vostra è la 6A. Inserite il codice 4289 e premete la levetta accanto ai numeri, la cassetta si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e all'interno troverete le chiavi per poter accedere all'alloggio.

Se arrivate in treno o in autobus potrete raggiungere l'appartamento comodamente a piedi. La stazione centrale dista solo un centinaio di metri.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al multipiano Saba Parking https://www.sabait.it/it/parcheggio-trieste/parcheggio-saba-silos, si trova accanto alla stazione centrale e costa 10€ al giorno. Altrimenti potete cercare un parcheggio gratuito sotto il palazzo e nelle vie limitrofe, senza avere fretta.

Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste a pochi metri.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. Cortesemente non lasciate i sacchi dell'immondizia nel cesto d'ingresso, trovate i cassonetti a 100 m dall'appartamento, all'incrocio tra via Udine e via Ritmayer.

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta.

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Buon soggiorno!

--------------------

Hello laura,
we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival.

The apartment is in via Ghiberti 6, first floor, unit 6A. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent.
Check-out is by 10 AM.

Building access: ring the bell "Ghiberti 6", the first one in the bottom right of the right bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses.
Apartment access: go up the stairs and you will find in front of you, the apartment number 6, besides it there is two key boxes, yours is 6A. Enter the code 4289 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment.

If you arrive by train or by bus, you can reach the apartment by walking. The train and bus station are only 100m far from the building.

If you arrive by car, we suggest you park at Silos Parking https://www.sabait.it/en/parking-trieste/parking-saba-silos, it is near the central station, about 100m far from the building, and costs 10€ per day. There is also some free parking in front of the building, and in the nearby streets, but you may need to wait a bit to find an available spot.

If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste few meters far. We don't offer this service for safety reasons.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. Please don't leave the garbage bags in the entrance bin, please use the bins 100m far from the apartment, at the intersection between via Udine and via Ritmayer.

We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request.

Last thing: in according with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment.

WiFi net: Ghiberti
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!
